activities

Table tennis

This over 50's group is small and friendly, the emphasis is on socialising as well as playing. Great for meeting new people and enjoying a little exercise too.

Times: Monday 7.00pm - 8.30pm

Cost: £1

Location: St George's Community Centre

Additional info: Bats and balls provided

Enquire about Table tennis

St George’s provides happy, welcoming spaces where local people can feel part of something.

A big thank you to all our funders and partners!

Our partners include Big Lottery Local Sustainability Fund, Children in Need, CCG Wakefield, NatWest bank, Nova, and the Police & Crime Commissioner
